prompts: Create a dark-type Pokemon with black feathers and intimidating red eyes.
I want a Pokemon that embodies the essence of destruction and chaos.
Generate a legendary creature with powerful wings and a menacing aura.
Make a mythical Pokemon that represents life and death in balance.
Imagine a Pokemon with a sleek, predatory design that excels in aerial combat.
Design a creature that thrives in dark, mysterious environments.
Show me a Pokemon that has the ability to absorb energy from its surroundings.
